_metadata.description: Phase 1 UI user flow requirements for comprehensive integration testing

requirements.title: Project list displays and allows navigation to project detail
requirements.description: Users can view projects on the dashboard and click a project card to navigate to its detail view

validation.notes: Validates project grid rendering and navigation to project detail view

requirements.title: Project search filters the project list
requirements.description: Users can search for projects by name or description, with results updating in real-time

validation.notes: Tests search filtering and clearing search to restore full list

requirements.title: Project editing updates name and description
requirements.description: Users can edit project details through a modal dialog, with changes reflected immediately

validation.notes: Validates opening edit modal, updating fields, and persisting changes

requirements.title: Workflow creation and builder loading
requirements.description: Users can create new workflows and have the workflow builder load successfully

validation.notes: Tests workflow creation flow including AI modal bypass and builder loading

requirements.title: Workflow selection from project detail
requirements.description: Users can select workflows from the project detail list and load them into the builder

validation.notes: Validates workflow list display and navigation to builder with selected workflow

requirements.title: Execution history tab displays and allows viewing execution details
requirements.description: Users can switch to execution history tab and select executions to view detailed information

validation.notes: Tests tab navigation, execution list rendering, and execution viewer opening

requirements.title: Workflow execution from project detail
requirements.description: Users can trigger workflow execution from the project detail view and see execution indicators

validation.notes: Validates execute button functionality and execution status feedback

requirements.title: Switch between Workflows and Executions tabs in Project Detail
requirements.description: Users can navigate between Workflows and Executions tabs in the project detail view to see different content sections

validation.notes: Validates tab switching between workflows and executions in project detail view

requirements.title: Execution viewer displays Replay tab with timeline and screenshots
requirements.description: The execution viewer Replay tab shows the execution timeline, screenshots, and replay controls for viewing past workflow runs

validation.notes: Validates replay tab display with timeline, screenshots, and controls
